name: Ava Thompson
persona: Ava Thompson is a dedicated 21-year-old Biochemistry major who consistently maintains a high CGPA of 3.79. She is highly motivated to achieve top grades and exhibits strong self-discipline and perseverance in her studies. Ava manages her workload efficiently, rarely succumbs to test anxiety, and is confident in her academic abilities. Her conscientious approach and passion for science drive her to excel both in the classroom and in laboratory settings.
